LanguageData.PolarisMessageFailedMakeCartridge: {0} must have more than 60 opinion points with {1}.
LanguageData.PolarisConvertCombatChipDESC: Please select the mode of the tactical chip you wish to convert into with these following options.
LanguageData.PolarisMessageFailedConvertCombatChip: {0} doesn't have a tactical chip installed or available.
LanguageData.PolarisResetCombatChipDesc: Reset the chip, make it unactive and re-active to another type.
LanguageData.PolarisActiveCombatChipDesc: Click and select a mode of the chip you wish to convert into with these following options.
LanguageData.PolarisOrbitalTraderCouldNotArrival: There isn't enough room to call a new orbital ship.
LanguageData.PolarisTraitreleaserEffectDESC: You can choose to get the recorded trait or remove a trait from the subject. By removing a trait, the mechanites will record it and replace the pre-existing trait.
LanguageData.PolarisTraitreleaserChoseRemoveTrait: Choose a trait to remove from the subject.
LanguageData.PolarisTraitreleaserUsedReplaceConflitTr: In order to get {1}, {0} lost the following trait(s): {2}.
LanguageData.PolarisMomeryResterChildhoodModeActiveDe: On this mode, it'll change the subject's childhood backstory. Click on the icon to switch into adulthood backstory mode.
LanguageData.PolarisMomeryResterAdulthoodModeActiveDe: On this mode, it'll change the subject's adulthood backstory. Click on the icon to switch into childhood backstory mode.
LanguageData.PolarisMomeryResterHaveNoAvaliableStory: {0} has no available backstory that could be changed. Set the backstory with {1}.
LanguageData.PolarisCurerApplyToHumanDESC: If actived, the curer will tend humans' wounds.
LanguageData.PolarisVoidKeyTryLinkGizmoDesc: Try to get a missing pawn data that was your colonist or animal.
LanguageData.PolarisVoidKeyWindowInformation: You can view all of the missing pawn that were your colonist or animal, and choose which one you want to resurrect.
LanguageData.PlrsForceResetDESC: Reset the shield status forcedly, this action will cost some hitpoints.
LanguageData.PlrsNoEnoughHitPointsToReset: Has no enough hit points for reset.
LanguageData.PolarisPsyChipDesc: This combat chip could store psyfocus when you won't use abilities, and draw out psycocus when you need.\nIt could also convert few psyfocus every time you cast ablity.
LanguageData.PolarisPsyChipActived: \n\nIn this way, the chip won't store psyfocus, and it will give back focus when you release ability if it has stored.
LanguageData.PolarisPsyChipNotActived: \n\nIn this way, the chip will store redundant psyfocus per hour.
